project.name: TestFlightDeployer
project.scriptdef: importClass(java.io.File); importPackage(java.lang); importPackage(org.apache.http); importPackage(org.apache.http.client); importPackage(org.apache.http.impl.client); importPackage(org.apache.http.client.methods); importPackage(org.apache.http.entity.mime); importPackage(org.apache.http.entity.mime.content); importPackage(org.apache.http.impl.client); importPackage(org.apache.http.util); var httpclient = new DefaultHttpClient(); var httppost = new HttpPost("http://testflightapp.com/api/builds." + attributes.get("format")); var reqEntity = new MultipartEntity(); reqEntity.addPart("file", new FileBody(new File(attributes.get("file")))); reqEntity.addPart("api_token", new StringBody(attributes.get("token"))); reqEntity.addPart("team_token", new StringBody(attributes.get("teamtoken"))); reqEntity.addPart("notes", new StringBody(attributes.get("notes"))); reqEntity.addPart("notify", new StringBody(attributes.get("notify"))); reqEntity.addPart("distribution_lists", new StringBody(attributes.get("lists"))); httppost.setEntity(reqEntity); var response = httpclient.execute(httppost); var resEntity = response.getEntity(); System.out.println(response.getStatusLine()); if (resEntity != null) { System.out.println("Response content length: " + resEntity.getContentLength()); } System.out.print(EntityUtils.toString(resEntity)); httpclient.getConnectionManager().shutdown();
